content-structure.name: Content Structure
content-structure.description: How well the content is organized with clear headings, lists, and atomic steps

CS-01.name: Paragraph brevity
CS-01.description: Prefer bullet points over long paragraphs

CS-03.name: Step atomicity
CS-03.description: Break procedures into short, atomic steps with one action per step

CS-04.name: Heading hierarchy
CS-04.description: Use clear, descriptive headings that reflect user intent

CS-05.name: Workflow separation
CS-05.description: Keep workflows clearly separated (install, usage, uninstall on different pages)

outcomes-reversibility.name: Outcomes & Reversibility
outcomes-reversibility.description: Whether actions clearly state their effects and reversibility

OR-01.name: Outcome clarity
OR-01.description: Describe what changes as a result of the action

OR-02.name: Affected data
OR-02.description: Explicitly state what data or settings are affected

OR-03.name: Reversibility stated
OR-03.description: Clearly indicate whether the action is reversible

OR-04.name: Destructive warnings
OR-04.description: Include disclaimer or note for major destructive actions

terminology.name: Consistent Terminology
terminology.description: Whether the same terms are used consistently throughout

AV-01.name: Term consistency
AV-01.description: Standardize action terms across all documentation

AV-02.name: No term conflation
AV-02.description: Avoid interchangeable terms that imply different outcomes

text-over-visuals.name: Text Over Visuals
text-over-visuals.description: Whether instructions are text-based rather than image-dependent

TB-01.name: Text-first instructions
TB-01.description: Describe steps in clear text instead of relying on images

TB-02.name: Image ratio
TB-02.description: Use visuals as supporting material, not primary source

TB-03.name: Alt text coverage
TB-03.description: All images have descriptive alt text

self-contained.name: Self-Contained Context
self-contained.description: Whether each section provides sufficient context without relying on external references

GAP-03.name: No dangling references
GAP-03.description: Sections should not start with pronouns without clear antecedents

GAP-04.name: Self-sufficient sections
GAP-04.description: Avoid 'as mentioned above' without restating key information

permissions-plans.name: Permissions & Plans
permissions-plans.description: Whether scope, permissions, and plan requirements are clearly stated

PP-01.name: Scope defined
PP-01.description: Clearly define the scope and eligibility for each action

PP-02.name: Plan requirements
PP-02.description: Explicitly mention supported plans and product editions

PP-03.name: Permission requirements
PP-03.description: Clearly state required roles and permissions

PP-04.name: Preconditions stated
PP-04.description: Call out preconditions that must be met before the action is available
